props.displayValue: Value to display for the component, possibly a formatted date.
props.hideHeader: Determines whether the header is hidden in the calendar view.
props.hideWeekNumber: Toggles the display of week numbers in a calendar view.
props.intervals: Total number of intervals in a day view.
props.max: Maximum date or value that can be selected.
props.min: Minimum date or value that can be selected.
props.month: Specifies the month for the calendar view.
props.showAdjacentMonths: Shows or hides days from adjacent months.
props.type: Defines the type of calendar view, such as month, week, day, etc.
props.weekdays: Specifies which days of the week to display.
props.year: Specifies the year for the calendar view.

events.next: Emitted when moving to the next time period.
events.prev: Emitted when moving to the previous time period.
events.updateModelValue: Event that is emitted when the componentâ€™s model changes.

exposed.daysInMonth: Provides data about the days in the selected month.
exposed.daysInWeek: Provides data about the days in the selected week.
exposed.genDays: Generates day objects based on provided dates.
